title: The Basics
text: Core Angular basics you have to know
moreInfo: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript. Angular is written in TypeScript. It implements core and optional functionality as a set of TypeScript libraries that you import into your applications.

title: Components
text: Components are a core concept for building Angular UIs and apps
moreInfo: Within components you can split logic (and markup) into separate building blocks and then combine those building blocks (and re-use them) to build powerful user interfaces

title: Events
moreInfo: Events allow you to trigger code on demand!
